channel.title: Need help with making a new starting place
channel.description: Hi everybody of moparscape. I am looking for help with making a new starting place for my server,i know how to chage the place but how do i get everything like the npcs and the bank to go with it. can anybody help me with this?

item.title: Need help with making a new starting place
item.dc:creator: @X-J-K-X X-J-K-X

item.title: Need help with making a new starting place
item.dc:creator: @Goldenboy Goldenboy
item.source: Need help with making a new starting place

item.title: Need help with making a new starting place
item.dc:creator: @X-J-K-X X-J-K-X
item.description:
@X-J-K-X wrote:

Also, if you wanna change the starting point, go to Player.java, and search for

// initial

Then, you will see something like…

		// initial x and y coordinates of the player
		heightLevel = 0;
		//Blah
		teleportToX = XXXX;
		teleportToY = YYYY;

Just change the XXXX - To the X coordinate. And the YYYY - To the Y coordinate.

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with making a new starting place

item.title: Need help with making a new starting place
item.dc:creator: @Goldenboy Goldenboy

item.title: Need help with making a new starting place
item.dc:creator: @I_Br3ndan_I I Br3ndan I
item.description:
@I_Br3ndan_I wrote:

For the NPC’s, just go into autospawn.CFG and then change their coordinates from there. For the objects, I’ve forgotten where abouts they are. It’s been too long.

Read full topic
